name: Classic Denim Jacket
shortDescription: Timeless denim jacket with a modern fit
description: Our classic denim jacket combines traditional craftsmanship with contemporary style. Made from premium denim fabric, this versatile piece features a comfortable regular fit, metal button closures, and functional chest pockets. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Urban Bomber Jacket
shortDescription: Sleek bomber jacket for the modern urbanite
description: Step up your style game with our urban bomber jacket. Featuring a lightweight yet durable construction, ribbed cuffs and hem, and a smooth zipper closure. The perfect blend of comfort and street style for everyday wear.

name: Premium Leather Jacket
description: Crafted from genuine leather, this premium jacket offers unmatched quality and style. Features include asymmetric zipper closure, multiple pockets, and a sleek silhouette. An investment piece that gets better with age.

name: Sporty Hoodie
shortDescription: Comfortable athletic hoodie for active lifestyle
description: Stay comfortable during workouts or casual outings with our sporty hoodie. Made from moisture-wicking fabric with a soft fleece interior. Features include an adjustable drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbed cuffs.

name: Essential Crew Neck Hoodie
description: The perfect everyday hoodie made from premium cotton blend. Simple, comfortable, and versatile. Features a classic crew neck design, soft interior lining, and a relaxed fit that works for any casual occasion.

name: Zip-Up Track Hoodie
shortDescription: Athletic zip hoodie with modern design
description: Designed for athletes and style enthusiasts alike. This zip-up hoodie features moisture-wicking technology, full-length zipper, side pockets, and a contemporary fit. Perfect for pre-workout warm-ups or casual wear.

name: Classic Fit T-Shirt
shortDescription: Essential cotton tee for everyday wear
description: A wardrobe staple made from 100% premium cotton. This classic fit t-shirt offers superior comfort and durability. Features include reinforced seams, tagless design for comfort, and a timeless crew neck cut.

name: Premium V-Neck Tee
shortDescription: Refined v-neck t-shirt in soft cotton
description: Elevate your basics with our premium v-neck tee. Crafted from soft, breathable cotton with a flattering v-neck design. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Designed to maintain its shape wash after wash.
